subject: Re: [Important] We couldn't charge your Card
preview: Hi Mick,  Hope you're doing really well!  Just a quick note to let you know that the previous DNS records I sent through can be disregarded — there’s been an update, and here are the correct ones

full_threads.body:
Hi Mick,

Hope you're doing really well!

Just a quick note to let you know that the previous DNS records I sent through can be disregarded — there’s been an update, and here are the correct ones to use:

TXT Record
Name/Host: _cf-custom-hostname
Value: e1650481-a283-4182-a01e-48fc2c60d2ae
CNAME Record
Name/Host: _acme-challenge
Domain Name: hungrydinermedia.com.au.kinstavalidation.app

If you can please update those on your end when you get a chance, that would be great. Let me know if you need any help with it at all — happy to jump in.

This ticket has been idle for over 24 hours.

If you need to respond to the client, please create a new conversation and close this ticket. Once the new ticket is created, continue the conversation there.

For guidance, refer to this walkthrough: 
  • https://www.loom.com/share/238808eaaeaa428a80a85441547b7e50?sid=1e84bd29-3621-4f82-8dac-5237bd08e5a5
  • https://www.loom.com/share/b1f338d04eb44b118d915b107a6ed087?sid=1dbc4938-b676-4cd2-a748-5692874039dc

Hi Michael,

Thanks for your message.

This is regarding DNS updates—do you have access to where your domain is currently registered (like GoDaddy, Namecheap, etc.)?

Once we know where the domain is managed, we can walk you through what’s needed or even assist directly if you’re able to share access.

Let me know what works best—happy to help either way!

Hi Team,

Sorry where am I adding this?
Best,

Michael Teasdale
Director, Hungry Diner Media
www.hungrydinermedia.com.au

Hi Michael,

I hope you are doing well.

Here is the first batch of DNS records
Please find below the first batch for configuration:

TXT Record
Name/Host: _cf-custom-hostname.www
Value: eefd3cf2-301e-4bf8-afa8-bb7aaeb14278
CNAME Record
Name/Host: _acme-challenge.www
Domain Name: www.hungrydinermedia.com.au.kinstavalidation.app

Let me know once these have been added, or if you need anything further.

Hi Mick,

Thank you so much for confirming – we’re excited to get things rolling!

One of our developers will be in touch shortly to guide you through the next steps and ensure a smooth reactivation of your website.

If you have any questions in the meantime, feel free to reach out.

Looking forward to working with you again!

Thanks so much. Happy to proceed on that plan.

Best,

Michael Teasdale
Director, Hungry Diner Media
www.hungrydinermedia.com.au

Hi Mick,

We’re so excited to have you back with us at Wolf IQ!

To get started with reactivating your website, could you please confirm which plan you’d like to continue with?

You were previously on our Hosting Only Plan at $59/month.

Once confirmed, one of our development team members will reach out to you with the next steps to get things back online smoothly.

Let us know if you’re happy to proceed with that plan or if you’d like to explore other options.

Thanks again, we’re thrilled to be working with you again!
